entry.key: Pool - Num Tests Per Eviction Run

entry.value:
flowfile = session.get() if flowfile is not None: waitState = flowfile.getAttribute( '_wait_state' )
# this process has no wait_state Set, so set it and penalize it if waitState is None: flowfile = session.putAttribute( flowfile, '_wait_state', '1' ) flowfile = session.penalize(flowfile) session.transfer( flowfile, REL_FAILURE ) # this flowfile has already penalized else: flowfile = session.removeAttribute( flowfile, '_wait_state' ) session.transfer( flowfile, REL_SUCCESS )
